title: Nice food.
text:
Good food. You can choose from big plates to fast food. Burgers are really good.
And they have a nice bar with a pool outside.

title: Very good attention.
text: With went with some friends without having an appointment but they accept us and they give us a glass of champagne before lunch. Food and attention was really good. We will come back soon.

title: Very nice visit.
text: Was one of the things I was unsure to visit because the amount of people going there every day. But September is a good month to do it. You can take your time and pictures without lots is turists around you.

title: Very interesting museum
text: I really enjoy the time there in the museum. Lots information and also lots historical knowledge. Is a most to do in Athens for sure.

title: Very nice visit
text: Interesting! I really enjoy to know more about it. Must be a visit for free. Is the only think I can add.
